## Load Packages Here
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Get the Data
```{r}
features <- read.csv('features.csv')
train <- read.csv('train.csv')
Dept_Names <- readxl::read_xlsx('department codes.xlsx')
DF <- merge(features, train, by = c("Store","Date"))
Walmart <- left_join(DF, Dept_Names, by = "Dept")
```

## Data Wrangle
```{r}
Christmas_2010 <- Walmart %>%
  filter(Date == '2010-12-24') %>%
  group_by(Dept_name) %>%
  summarise(sum_sales = sum(Weekly_Sales)) %>%
  arrange(desc(sum_sales))
Christmas_2010
```
